text: Below are the squads for the 22nd Arabian Gulf Cup in Saudi Arabia, held in 2014. Caps and goals are correct prior to the tournament. ==Group A== ===Saudi Arabia=== Coach: Juan Ramón López Caro ===Yemen=== Coach: Miroslav Soukup ===Bahrain=== Coach: Adnan Hamad Akr ===Qatar=== Coach: Djamel Belmadi ==Group B== ===United Arab Emirates=== Coach: Mahdi Ali ===Iraq=== Coach: Hakeem Shaker ===Kuwait=== Coach: Jorvan Vieira ===Oman=== Coach: Paul Le Guen ==References== squads
title: 22nd Arabian Gulf Cup squads
